mn86:3.9: saṅkaritvā → saṁharitvā saṁharitvā (bj, pts1ed); saṅgaritvā (sya-all, km)
mn86:6.11: Mahāvanaṁ pāpuṇi saccavādī → mahāvanaṁ samaṇoyaṁ paccupādi (bj); mahāvanaṁ samaṇa paccupādi (sya-all, km); mahāvanaṁ samaṇoyaṁ paccavādi (pts1ed)
mn86:6.12: Sohaṁ carissāmi pahāya pāpaṁ → sohaṁ carissāpi pahassaṁ pāpaṁ (bj); sohaṁ cirassāpi pahāssaṁ pāpaṁ (si); sohaṁ carissāmi pajahissa pāpaṁ (sya-all, km); sohaṁ cirassā pahāssaṁ pāpaṁ (pts1ed)
mn86:13.8: Handa ca dāni → handadāni (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn86:15.2: yatohaṁ, bhagini, jāto → bhagini jātiyā jāto (si)
mn86:18.3: pubbeva → yo ca pubbe (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn86:18.24: pana kiñci naṁ → kañcanaṁ (bj); kañci naṁ (si, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn86:18.38: naṁ hiṁsāmi kiñci naṁ → kañci naṁ (si, sya-all, km, pts1ed); kañcanaṁ (?)
mn86:18.59: Svāgataṁ → sāgataṁ (bj, pts1ed) | nāpagataṁ → nāma sagataṁ (mr)
